product_title: Quick Dry Max Decay Bikini Top
product_details_and_care:
Constructed from a stretchy, compressive fabric with six-anchor-point support, this top delivers a confident fit that keeps up with your most intense activities, in and out of the water.
Crossback straps for a supportive, stay-put fit
Powermesh stabilizers
Removable soft cups
70% nylon, 30% spandex
Hand wash, line dry
Imported
Women's Active & Swim
Item #5585781
product_size_info:
Swimwear sizing is smaller than apparel sizing; order one size up.
XS=00-0, S=2-4, M=6-8, L=10-12, XL=14.
